author: Anonymous Helix
title: makeup lab
question: Hi, I registered for the lab on Monday, but I get the information that I have been add last night. Obviously, I missed lab 1. What should I do if I have already finished the form of academic concession form to apply for the makeup lab this week, but I get no response. As this week is coming to an end, I am worried about whether I can get a reply and a zoom link to the lab so that I can make up it and get the score.
instructor_answer: Sorry, but @6. This is covered in the Syllabus.
